articles.title: Al Qaeda promises 'war on all fronts' against America as Biden pulls out of Afghanistan - CNN Philippines
articles.description: America's 'war on terror' is about to enter a new phase as President Joe Biden prepares to withdraw all US forces from Afghanistan by the 20th anniversary of 9/11, but now al Qaeda claims its war with America is far from over.
articles.content: (CNN) -- This weekend marks the 10th anniversary since Osama Bin Laden, the mastermind of the September 11, 2001, attacks on the United States, was killed by US special-operations forces, Seal Team 6… [+8790 chars]

articles.title: How Apple's 'Mosquito Coast' changes the book for the worse - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: Justin Theroux stars in Apple's spin on his uncle Paul's novel about an American family abroad. But the people they meet there are mostly cartoons.

By Rosalba O’Brien
A statement released by his family said Collins died of cancer.
